title: Forte or For-tay: Is Pronunciation Your Strong Suit? (minicast) - 24 June 2010
description:
How do you pronounce this word that means someone's "strong suit"? And what does it have to do with fencing?--A Way with Words is funded by its listeners: http://waywordradio.org/donateGet your language question answered on the air!
